title: Need to find font that approximates this custom.
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016090722im_/http:/typophile.com/files/dragonforce-final_4606.jpg)

Something similar to this. Something script-like, with a western/carnival appeal, or something very close that could be easily customized with extra serifs or shapes.
author: TheAL

comments.content:
It’s fairly obvious that this is hand-lettering, and somewhat of a fantasy (meaning it is not readily apparent that it’s based on any particular typeface).

These may or may not be useful...  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/durham-abbey-nf/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016090722/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/durham-abbey-nf/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/durham-abbey-nf/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/grand-prairie-wbw/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016090722/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/grand-prairie-wbw/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/grand-prairie-wbw/")
